title: Gravel Racing’s Largest Single Race Prize Purse is Now in South Africa
content:
Gravel Burn, set to debut in South African on October 26, is putting up $150,000 to the top riders at the eight-day stage race.

Read the full article at Gravel Racing’s Largest Single Race Prize Purse is Now in South Africa on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
